purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to support template three dimensionsal shape.

inscope.li: part template three dimensional keepout shape;
items within the scope of application module Extended elemental geometric shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1667;
items within the scope of application module Non feature shape element, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1706;
items within the scope of application module Part template shape with parameters, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1720;
items within the scope of application module Physical layout template, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1722.

ae.refpath: {shape_representation <= representation [representation.id= 'nfsd'] [representation.name = '3d bound volume shape'] [representation.description = 'pt3dks'] [representation representation.context_of_items -> representation_context => geometric_representation_context geometric_representation_context.coordinate_space_dimension = 3] [representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.definition -> property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition product_definition => part_template_definition]}

{shape_representation <= representation [representation.name = '3d bound volume shape'] [representation.description = 'pt3ds'] [representation representation.context_of_items -> representation_context => geometric_representation_context geometric_representation_context.coordinate_space_dimension = 3] [representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.definition -> property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition product_definition => part_template_definition]}
